title: [中槍片詳細分析] 肯定開槍黑警係想謀殺個學生 (求推國際)

replies.msg:
近距離HKU video
https://streamable.com/9g1f6
中等距離CityU video
https://streamable.com/ksnrt
New York Times
https://www.nytimes.com/video/world/asia/100000006745719/hong-kong-protester-shot.html

大家留意受害人本身在黑警右邊
由黑警角度睇，槍本來係指向受害人左邊位置
黑警如果生命受威脅要開槍應該揀最低殺傷力位置同最近最快既位置開槍， 即係佢既角度應該望住受害人o既左邊 (即受害人右邊身體)
但佢冇咁做， 反而係郁多d 隻手去佢自己右邊(即受害人左邊心臟位置) 先開槍
所以我可以肯定佢係想殺死個細路
另外學生果碌棍只係打中佢件衫， 唔知有咩生命威脅， 又唔係刀又唔係劍
如果話係要救地下果個，應該射打緊果d唔係射離群果個

請forward去國際戰線同任何媒體

In the police gunfire incident that happened in Tsuen Wan on 1st Oct 2019, the police officer who shot the Secondary School teenager actually attempted to murder him.

1. The police officer never verbally warned that he will use a live round to shoot at the protestors. This clearly violates the rules and regulations for the use of lethal force.

2. He chose the most lethal position of the victim to shoot while he has various kinds of choice even if he was forced to shoot. In the video, we can see that the protestor was on the right-hand side of the police officer originally (from the police officer's point of view). If the police officer believes he had an imminent threat of death, he should shoot the protestor at the FASTEST speed and choose a LESS-LETHAL position to shoot.
In this case, the FASTEST way to shoot the protestor is to shoot his right torso, right hand or right leg. Also, the LESS-LETHAL positions are also on the right-hand side of the protestor.
However, the police officer decided to move his hand further towards the heart, which is located on the left-hand side of the protestor and fired a live round. This action is SLOWER AND MOST LETHAL and it violates the rules and regulations of use of firearms. CT scan and X-ray images showed that the bullet is just about 3cm from his heart and the main artery.

3. The police officer himself is clearly not having an imminent threat of death. The protestor did not even hit his forearm with the rod. Instead, he just hit the officer's thick protective clothing. If the protestor did hit the officer's forearm with force, the officer's hand will be pushed downwards instead of staying straight. Even if he really hit the police officer's forearm directly, if we do not see the officer's hand being pushed downwards, it must be a light force (simple physics) and it is clearly not an imminent threat of death.

4. The officer being hit on the ground has not suffered any serious injuries, so it is absolutely not an imminent threat of death for him too. If you look at the later part of the video, he stood up and returned to his team swiftly without showing any sense of serious injuries.

5. The police officer has a less-lethal weapon on his left hand, and he has pepper spray with him. He can use his rubber bullet / sponge bullet gun to shoot at the protestors from his original position, which is 5 meters away from the protestors (look at the 0:00 of City University Student Press video). But he decided to use his revolver and run towards the protestors. Firstly, he used his leg to kick towards the victim while pointing the revolver at him, then the victim stroke back with a metal rod. Then he chose to shoot at his heart while he has a lot of other choices to control the protestor.

In conclusion, the police officer attempted a murder.
